H0.text: Which UK store was first to have an escalator installed. Selfridges

H1.text: Which UK store was first to have an escalator installed. Liberty London

H2.text: Which UK store was first to have an escalator installed. Marks & Spencer

H3.text: Which UK store was first to have an escalator installed. Harrods

A4.text: Harrods debuted England's first moving staircase (escalator) on 16 November 1898.
